---具体item lua 对象 与 ScrollViewBaseItem 一一对应
---@class UIScrollViewLoopDemoListItem
UIScrollViewLoopDemoListItem = class('UIScrollViewLoopDemoListItem', objectlua.Object, _M)

function UIScrollViewLoopDemoListItem:initialize(view, transform)
    super.initialize(self)
    self._transform = transform
    self._view = view
    self._indexText =nil
    self._index =-1

    self:initComponent(transform)
end

function UIScrollViewLoopDemoListItem:initComponent(transform)
    self._indexText =  transform:Find("index"):GetComponent("Text")
    self._btSelf = transform:GetComponent("Button")
    self._btSelf.onClick:AddListener(function ()
        self:onBtSelf()
    end)
end

function UIScrollViewLoopDemoListItem:setData(index)
    self._index =index
    self._indexText.text= index
end

function UIScrollViewLoopDemoListItem:onBtSelf()
    log("点击的数据:".. self._index)
end
